AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_RescueSenior_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="c05b858dd6a0430793369c8fd24a8620" Scale="1"/]There's an SOS signal coming from this area!
I hope we find one of our Rescue Officers.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_RescueSenior_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="0c5d059396854e488c7594fc3ccdf6d4" Scale="1"/]There's an SOS signal coming from here too.
Do you think it could be a Rescue Officer?
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_AreaOpen_Area001_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="6ab191c07e664a5c9c2812b31b461d5d" Scale="1"/]It looks like there might be a missing
Rescue Officer here! We need to get
out there and find them.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_AreaOpen_Area002_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="f7ca4221276942c7b8dcc735aa3b3571" Scale="1"/]We've confirmed another SOS signal in this
area. One of our missing Rescue Officers
may be waiting for us here.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_AreaOpen_Area003_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="2e7bd2487a8047d5895730b29afce8a6" Scale="1"/]According to the radar, there are several
SOS signals in this new area.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_AreaOpen_Area010_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="9078d7409351403cbc48430f48c4249a" Scale="1"/]There's a significant chance that
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is here! Keep an
eye out for him as you explore!
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_AreaOpen_Area004_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="6fdd0b1cf7884aca836b6775069241f5" Scale="1"/]For now, we need to focus our search efforts
on finding the veterinarian [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]. It'd be nice
if she were in this area, but...
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_AreaOpen_Area006_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="f8635e64eb7b4e6590164e115e26d7a3" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] must be here this time! We've got to
rescue her quickly so she can check poor
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s tail!
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_UnlockArea_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="7d5b90d8e0e84f1b955521614d591f23" Scale="1"/]Keep collecting sparklium to repair the radar.
Then we'll be able to receive SOS signals
from even farther away.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_UnlockArea_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="f33026c3c8134c2898c16515fc14e4ce" Scale="1"/]We don't have nearly enough sparklium yet.
Try to collect more treasure.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_UnlockArea_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="5c7e6e4db9e94e8180623886626704fc" Scale="1"/]You're bound to find more treasure if you
explore every part of this area.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_RescueSenior_Not_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="6d29750a02d745128a204bde86c9aa43" Scale="1"/]There are no more SOS signals in this area.
We must have found all the castaways here!
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_RescueSenior_Not_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="17f63f507ed342429fc5cc1fb4d0acb1" Scale="1"/]I'm not receiving any more SOS signals from
castaways. Looks like we've already found
everyone in this area!
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_Unleaf_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="3460a83e9715458b84fa022c0ce1d160" Scale="1"/]Uh-oh. Our pilot, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], might be a leafling
now. Please find and rescue him.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_Unleaf_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="8234423914fe457a8f80aaf6fc3fe9d2" Scale="1"/]Seems like there may be leaflings in the area.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_UnlockArea_Not_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="ec7d9422a393476a832b6b3f1075da86" Scale="1"/]I don't think there's any more treasure here.
Why don't we head to another area to collect
more sparklium?
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_UnlockArea_Not_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="772bb9f4e4054477b246184eaac63649" Scale="1"/]We still need more sparklium to repair
the S.S. Shepherd's radar.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_UnlockArea_Not_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="39656d77f6ff4a17a3394adf2b72d780" Scale="1"/]According to the latest data for this area,
all the treasure has been collected.
Time for us to move on.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_Unleaf_Not_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="ae7ca7305f414549a222f8b1d379b285" Scale="1"/]Still can't find our pilot, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], after all this
searching, huh? He must be in another area.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_Unleaf_Not_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="6d5431d9a4bb4adeaa6e741b22635359" Scale="1"/]I wonder where that leafling went. Let's go
search someplace else.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_CurePilot_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="7b416133a9c1432899aaeda52f97f270" Scale="1"/]Oh, you're out of medicine. It might be time
to go out for more glow sap.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_CurePilot_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="bd88fd065a1d407785b1d081a20e640d" Scale="1"/]Do you think that leafling you rescued could
be our pilot? I hope we can cure them soon
and find out.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_SearchOlimar_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="17672a09500f4c18b09258adae3a37b2" Scale="1"/]According to the Voyage Log entry [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]
found, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] should be in this area!
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_SearchOlimar_Not_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="02bfcff7d3db402dbb2525bc8966652b" Scale="1"/]Shouldn't you be looking for [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?
If you have other things to do, please finish
them up quickly.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_SearchOlimar_Not_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="6ad632284f9b4108a59aace163540e9c" Scale="1"/]This area doesn't seem to match the
coordinates in [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s log.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_UnleafOlimar_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="85ef4220bfa3486fb51add98d7c26957" Scale="1"/]We don't have any of the cure stocked up at
the moment, so it's probably a good time for
a night expedition.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_UnleafOlimar_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="5119a7f1a5374defb23b26d0c03e6bf0" Scale="1"/]That leafling is probably [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]. We
should try to cure them as soon as we can.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_Koppai1st_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="9df9ab1eddf742f6be5ffa1c98ee3f21" Scale="1"/]The presumed Koppaite castaway was
carried off! They should be somewhere
in this area.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_Koppai2nd_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="cb23280517d14d368e07504c0dc3d95c" Scale="1"/]Let's focus our search in this area! I think our
Koppaite friend may be nearby.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_Koppai3rd_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="e1e7263defc7437890129a408aee96cf" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is in this area! Let's hurry and rescue
her so she can take a look at [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_SearchLouie_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="848ca2a22c1141bca9ab6e258acc630b" Scale="1"/]If we search for [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], we're likely to find
clues about the giant dog too!
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_Koppai1st_Not_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="7d2a7b585f3444fba321ada1adaaffaf" Scale="1"/]The veterinarian [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] could be the source
of the SOS signal we got from the new area.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_Koppai1st_Not_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="a5be96b82239447ea3e5c037d42c758d" Scale="1"/]Based on what [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] said, there haven't
been any Koppaites sighted here.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_Koppai2nd_Not_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="4ba335681dec4284b1917109f9efbbbe" Scale="1"/]Is something about this area troubling you?
If you have anything to finish up here, go
ahead and take care of it.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_Koppai2nd_Not_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="8ef5a6a8140d4146af68938c5260441b" Scale="1"/]According to the Koppaite we rescued,
we'll find two more in another area.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_Koppai3rd_Not_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="3b0683999ef74d6b88a42be221d30b23" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is somewhere in an area with rampant
primordial forest growth!
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_Koppai3rd_Not_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="a823395dc463480ba6922e9af2d21d0f" Scale="1"/]I'm really concerned about [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_SearchLouie_Not_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="441d2837706e4d768c0e35366b8439f9" Scale="1"/]You won't find [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] in this area.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Story_SearchLouie_Not_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="7a6c5aea658f4f059071799592d19e10" Scale="1"/]To be honest, we don't think this is where
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] fled to.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Common_IncreasePikmin_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="b742f5d7396f47858b6b73b100200106" Scale="1"/]According to habitat data for this area,
there should be a lot of [Carrot:FewPikminName/] here.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Common_IncreasePikmin_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="447ba350bafd4180ac728c945157b30b" Scale="1"/]We should be able to collect a lot of
[Carrot:FewPikminName/] in this area.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Common_CollectPikmin_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="6ea49327e9f54146a90f45c0b9684e89" Scale="1"/]According to the Voyage Log, there seem to
be some different varieties of Pikmin here.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Common_CollectPikmin_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="f6739ce4ef694966b14e0f22d1b60a64" Scale="1"/]We could encounter a variety of Pikmin we
haven't seen before in this area.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Common_OpenCamp_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="91b9de7b103843ec823dad9e56f290d6" Scale="1"/]There seems to be at least one more good
base location in this area.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Common_OpenCamp_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="4d74c193cac04cee9d45cb99916de7b8" Scale="1"/]According to the radar, this area might still
have an undiscovered base.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Common_Rescue_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="b435d42f24fa4647a0fd6c515fdfe3ef" Scale="1"/]Hey, there's still an SOS signal here.
Let's hurry up and find whoever sent it!
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Common_Rescue_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="3c79ec6cd05243a983a2fb12c2af4ceb" Scale="1"/]Somewhere around here, there's a castaway
still in need of our help! This is a job for the
Rescue Corps!
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Common_CollectOnyon_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="d0100e8052a549c1a2a6fe69a43be938" Scale="1"/]It seems like there might be a type of Onion
here that we haven't found yet.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Common_CollectOnyon_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="7d3f23f4af5d4489a259b2d6c3a75fd6" Scale="1"/]There are so many varieties of Onions. Looks
like there's still another one here somewhere.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Common_CollectOtakara_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="280e7ea5da944aac9767c88d52cd4070" Scale="1"/]Huh?! There's still some treasure to be found
here. We wouldn't want to leave any behind!
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Common_CollectOtakara_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="063da8f492de4327ae8a2d8855d4b078" Scale="1"/]It might be worth searching some more to
make sure we didn't miss any treasure.
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Common_Complete_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="e9b11592d4934d4c8d55f4ce72f844a0" Scale="1"/]This area has been completely investigated!
AreaSelectDay.AreaSelect_Common_Complete_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="0e254c085d8743a59b43f886797d16dc" Scale="1"/]You've explored 100 percent of this area!
Great work! I'm not getting any more
readings from here.
